nodes.text: "The Trouble at Tibrin" focuses on Leia Organa and Luke Skywalker's diplomatic mission to Tibrin. It was published as the lead story of Star Wars Adventures 4 on November 29, 2017.

Above the planet Tibrin on the edge of the Hadar sector, an important diplomatic mission to Tibrin was taking place. Piloting the Breha, Luke Skywalker and Liddle prepared to orbit the planet as Leia Organa dressed as a diplomat for the mission. The Galactic Empire allowed the ship to land without checking the security codes. Luke thought the Empire was not expecting trouble all the way out where they were in the galaxy but Tadd believed the Empire was hiding after the Rebel Alliance destroyed the First Death Star. The rebels were given permission to land near the capital where many of the Imperials were. Leia reminded everyone that if anyone asked, they were on a diplomatic mission from Naboo's House Berenko. Their real mission was to get the Ishi Tib to join the Rebel Alliance.

They landed and were greeted by Mariod Govi. Leia and the Ishi Tib left while Luke and the others stayed by the ship. Tadd asked Luke if it was really true that he rescued Princess Leia and fought Darth Vader. Luke told them that it was true that he rescued the princess but while they were talking an Imperial security droid noticed the Rebels. An explosion erupted in front of Leia and the Ishi Tibs. Leia rushed back and found Luke and the others in a firefight with stormtroopers. Luke ran over to the control panel and destroyed it with his lightsaber. The bridge between the platform the Imperials were on and their platform fell. Tabb got ready to throw a grenade to the other side but was shot before he could. The grenade exploded near Luke, causing their platform to begin falling. Leia managed to jump across to the Imperial platform and hide from them but Luke was not as fortune and taken into Imperial custody. The stormtroopers dragged Luke onto their shuttle as Leia tried to sneak up and grab him. But she was too late as the Imperials took off, leaving Leia wondered what she had gotten Luke into now.
